    Methods in net.minecraft.server that return ICondition.IContext
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ICondition.IContext
    ReloadableServerResources.getConditionContext()
    Exposes the current condition context for usage in other reload listeners.
    This is not useful outside the reloading stage.

    ICondition.IContext
    AddReloadListenerEvent.getConditionContext()
